headline: Dominion Energy Receives Regulatory Approval to Extend V.C. Summer Nuclear Station Operations for 20 Years
summary: CAYCE, S.C., July 01, 2025--The Nuclear Regulatory Commission (NRC) has approved Dominion Energy South Carolina’s application to extend the operating license for V.C. Summer Nuclear Station for an additional 20 years.

headline: Surging Clean Energy Demand Sparks Renewed Focus on Nuclear Stocks
summary: For investors aiming to build a nuclear-focused portfolio, companies like Entergy, Dominion Energy, and Constellation Energy present compelling opportunities.

headline: Dominion Energy Promotes Baine to Executive Vice President; Announces Retirement of Cardiff
summary: RICHMOND, Va., July 01, 2025--Dominion Energy (NYSE: D) today announced the promotion of Edward H. "Ed" Baine to executive vice president-Utility Operations and president-Dominion Energy Virginia. Baine has been leading Utility Operations – consisting of Dominion Energy Virginia and Dominion Energy South Carolina, together serving more than 4 million customer accounts – since Jan. 1, 2025, as president, and has led Dominion Energy Virginia as president since 2020. The promotion will take effect

headline: Dominion Energy allowed to extend South Carolina nuclear plant operations until 2062
summary: The U.S. nuclear regulator hasapproved Dominion Energy's application to extend theoperating license of its V.C. Summer power station in SouthCarolina till 2062, the utility said on Tuesday. ...
